section.name: Current status
section.p: For now, focus has been on the table/column tags that are used to show data extracted from a List in a simple and consistent way.

subsection.name: November 6, 2003
subsection.p: As you can see in the changelog, many bugs reported in 1.0-b1 are already fixed. Release 1.0-b2 is coming soon! Uploaded a fresh copy of the documentation, take a look at the new tag reference page (and at the new logo!).

subsection.name: September 28, 2003
subsection.p: Uploaded a new copy of 1.0-b1 binaries on sourceforge, compiled using jdk 1.3: older jar still seemed to have problems on jre 1.3. Compiling under jdk1.4 with a 1.1 jvm target (maven default?) was not enough.

subsection.name: September 22, 2003
subsection.p: Version 1.0-b1 has been released! This is the first beta featuring a completely rewritten library and lots of new features. The build and documentation are now maven powered!
A complete changelog is available. Click here to download the latest source or binary distribution.

subsection.name: September 21, 2003
subsection.p: Bugfix version 0.8.6 has been released. This is identical to the 0.8.5 version with a fix in the export feature and jre 1.3 compatible binaries.
